title: Disk space is low
description: Disk usage refers to the amount of storage space on a disk that is currently being used or occupied by data. This monitor tracks the free disk space within RabbitMQ to prevent running out of storage and potentially losing messages or data.

definition.name: [RabbitMQ - OMV2] Disk Space is Low

options.escalation_message:
Disk space is still extremely low. 
This can be caused by an overload of messages or persistent messages that are being mismanaged. 
Please resolve.
